titles.title: SNAP Education and Outreach Act of 2009
To improve outreach and enrollment for the Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program.
SNAP Education and Outreach Act of 2009

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Department Operations, Oversight, Nutrition and Forestry.

committee.name: House Agriculture
committee.subcommittee: Commodity Markets, Digital Assets, and Rural Development

bill.summary:
SNAP Education and Outreach Act of 2009 - Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to provide grants to eligible entities for outreach and enrollment efforts to increase supplemental nutrition assistance program participation.
Obligates 10% of such amounts for a national enrollment campaign.
